definition: pile of earth to keep wine jars
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]

sentences.english: Heartless laugh, was the best thing that I have.
sentences.chinese: 隃罏沒心沒肺的笑，是我擁有的最美好的東西。

sentences.english: A friend walked in and asked why he was so unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 一個朋友走進來問他爲何如此傷心罏。

sentences.english: For man is man and master of his fate.
sentences.chinese: 隃罏人就是人，是自己命運的主人。

sentences.english: Thee darkness of the heart must be done away with knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 心靈中的黑暗必須用罏知識來驅除。

sentences.english: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
sentences.chinese: 镼罏成功的祕訣在於對目標的忠實。

sentences.english: Time is a bird for ever on the wing.
sentences.chinese: 隃罏時間是一隻永遠在飛翔的鳥。

sentences.english: Difficult circumstances serve as a textbook of life for people.
sentences.chinese: 隃罏困難坎坷是人們的生活教科書。

sentences.english: Love is a light that never dims.
sentences.chinese: 镼罏愛是一盞永不昏暗的明燈。

definition: a kind of mosquito net/bed curtain
